attributes.action: Fathers rights, custody of a child for fathers
attributes.additional_details: Because fathers unmarried fathers have no rights,, when a woman forget to take her pill so she can keep her man then have a baby, the relationship crashes and the women is cruel denying access for the father .... this is cruel the mother uses a child as a weapon this is why... this happens a billions times over, a child need to see both parents ..
attributes.background: Review fathers rights for custody of there child, for non abusive fathers, somethings got to be done, for this day and age, fathers play a big part in there child lives...... they need more rights...
